abstract: The Imation Atom works with Windows, Apple and Linux computers, and it lets users protect data with a password and split the storage space into multiple virtual “drives.”
snippet: The Imation Atom works with Windows, Apple and Linux computers, and it lets users protect data with a password and split the storage space into multiple virtual “drives.”
lead_paragraph: Now that thumb drives like the one-inch Imation Atom are small enough to ingest, perhaps parents should talk to their children about the dangers of eating flash memory.

headline.main: A Tiny Thumb Drive With Big Capacity and a Safety Leash
headline.print_headline: A Tiny Thumb Drive With Big Capacity And a Safety Leash
